session_info.name: THXPLS - Invited Orals: Applications of Accelerators, Tech. Transfer and Industrial Rel

papers.title: Review of Ion Therapy Machine and Future Perspective
authors: Cancer therapy with ion beams presents several advantages as compared to proton therapy or conventional radiation therapy but its diffusion is limited by the size and cost of the accelerator facility. The ion therapy facilities are presently in operation have generated important developments in particular to the gantry
while new treatment facilities being planned in United States
and Asia. This talk will present the current status of this field
as well as the future perspective.
